title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/echarts-gl
author: Gk0Wk
name: ECharts GL
description: ECharts-GL provides 3D plots, globe visualization and WebGL acceleration
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/tw-echarts/tree/master/plugins/Gk0Wk/echarts-gl">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/tw-echarts/tree/master/plugins/Gk0Wk/echarts-gl"/></$button>

<$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang">
<$list filter="[<lang>search[zh]]">

[[ECharts-GL|https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts-gl]] 是Apache ECharts的一个扩展包，它提供3D绘图、地球仪可视化和WebGL加速。

* 文档: https://echarts.apache.org/zh/option-gl.html
* 示例: https://www.makeapie.com/explore.html#tags=echarts-gl

</$list>

<$list filter="[<lang>!search[zh]]">

[[ECharts-GL|https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts-gl]] is an extension pack of Apache ECharts, which providing 3D plots, globe visualization and WebGL acceleration.

* Doc: https://echarts.apache.org/en/option-gl.html
* Examples: https://www.makeapie.com/explore.html#tags=echarts-gl

</$list>
</$list>
